name: Uncharted Lands: Beginning
description:
This story is about a group of sailors returning home after a long voyage. On the way home, they got into a strong storm which damaged their ship and threw them to some coast. Whether they were lucky or this is just the beginning of the adventure, let's find out.

In the game we tried to bring a retro vibes of old games from early 90's and added some new features. Here is a full list of features you'll meet:
  • 6 unique levels;
  • over 30 unique enemies;
  • 18 spells;
  • procedural generation;
  • autosaving a progress;
  • good music, sounds;
  • no bugs :)
